mapper.sql: PK_ID, EQUIPMENT_ID, NODE_SIGN, IS_EMPOWER, UPLOAD_IP, RYJCXXCJBH, UPLOAD_STATUS, UPLOAD_RESULT_INFO, UPLOAD_DATETIME
mapper.select:
select rownum,log.* from (select
from LEDEN_UPLOAD_LOG where EQUIPMENT_ID = #{id} order by PK_ID desc) log where rownum = 1
mapper.insert:

PK_ID,
EQUIPMENT_ID,
NODE_SIGN,
IS_EMPOWER,
UPLOAD_IP,
RYJCXXCJBH,
UPLOAD_STATUS,
UPLOAD_RESULT_INFO,
UPLOAD_DATETIME,

mapper.update:
update LEDEN_UPLOAD_LOG
EQUIPMENT_ID = #{equipmentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NODE_SIGN = #{nodeSign,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_EMPOWER = #{isEmpower,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPLOAD_IP = #{uploadIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RYJCXXCJBH = #{ryjcxxcjbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPLOAD_STATUS = #{uploadStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPLOAD_RESULT_INFO = #{uploadResultInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPLOAD_DATETIME = #{uploadDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where PK_ID = #{pkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update LEDEN_UPLOAD_LOG set EQUIPMENT_ID = #{equipmentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NODE_SIGN = #{nodeSign,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_EMPOWER = #{isEmpower,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPLOAD_IP = #{uploadIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RYJCXXCJBH = #{ryjcxxcjbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPLOAD_STATUS = #{uploadStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPLOAD_RESULT_INFO = #{uploadResultInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPLOAD_DATETIME = #{uploadDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where PK_ID = #{pkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select * from ( select ROWNUM as rowno,
from LEDEN_UPLOAD_LOG
and upload_Status in
#{item}
order by upload_status, create_datetime ) where rowno=1
mapper.update: update leden_upload_log set is_get_code=#{isGetCode} where pk_id=#{pkId}
mapper.select: select d.* from ( select ryjcxxcjbh,ROWNUM r from leden_upload_log where upload_status='4' order by upload_datetime desc ) where r=1
